member.name: T:Sudoku.Drawing.Nodes.ChuteViewNode
member.summary: Defines a view node that highlights for a chute (i.e. 3 houses that is in a three blocks in a line).
member.param: Indicates the chute index. The value can be between 0 and 5.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Drawing.Nodes.ChuteViewNode.#ctor(Sudoku.Drawing.ColorIdentifier,System.Int32)
member.summary: Defines a view node that highlights for a chute (i.e. 3 houses that is in a three blocks in a line).
member.param: Indicates the chute index. The value can be between 0 and 5.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Drawing.Nodes.ChuteViewNode.IsRow
member.summary: Indicates whether the chute is in a row.

summary.para: Indicates a that represents for the houses used. The result mask is a 27-bit digit that represents every possible houses using cases.
Please note that the first 9-bit always keep the zero value because they is reserved bits for block houses, but all chutes don't use them.
